feed.title: Receipt Wrangler Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: Receipt Wrangler API v4.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • enhancement/return-app-data-on-login by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/176
  • Tech/flutter by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/177
  • Update swagger by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/178
  • Tech/consolidate configs by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/180
  • fix ci by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/181

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v3.15.0...v4.0.0

Breaking Changes

  • API Configuration has been consolidated into one config file, config.prod.json. To migrate, check out: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/.github/blob/main/configuration/configuration.md for the new structure, and simply move the database env variables from the docker compose, and the feature config values to config.prod.json. Check out: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/.github/tree/main/examples for some examples specific to your database type.

  • openApiKey has been removed from the configuration. To migrate, use the aiSettings in the config file instead as shown here: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/.github/blob/main/configuration/configuration.md

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: Receipt Wrangler API v4.3.0
entry.content:
Changes

  • Add experimental support for EasyOCR. Check out the documentation for more detail: https://receiptwrangler.io/docs/concepts/ocr
  • Implemented openAiCustom to officially support self-hosted LLM backends that are openAi compliant. Check out the documentation for more detail: https://receiptwrangler.io/docs/configuration/
  • Tons of code clean up

Pull Requests

  • Tech/improve ocr by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/205
  • Feature/add added at column by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/206
  • Feature/generalize openaicustom by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/209
  • Tech/update receipt update to use command by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/214
  • Tech/easy ocr poc by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/215
  • enhancement/bump-easy-ocr-performance by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/218
  • Tech/support mobile comments by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/219

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v4.2.0...v4.3.0

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: Receipt Wrangler API V5.0.0 (Breaking Changes)
entry.content:
Summary

Please visit https://www.reddit.com/r/selfhosted/comments/1ddg59j/receipt_wrangler_v5_released/ for the release post.

What's Changed

  • enhancement/support-mobile-image-edit by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/220
  • Tech/add encryption env variable by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/222
  • Tech/add system settings models by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/224
  • Feature/add system emails by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/227
  • Feature/create system emails and view system emails by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/228
  • Feature/add system emails by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/229
  • feature/system email implement delete by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/230
  • Feature/check-email-connectivity by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/231
  • Feature/add-system-tasks by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/232
  • bug/fix multi quick scan by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/233
  • Feature/add prompt table by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/235
  • Feature/prompt-crud by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/236
  • Feature/receipt processing settings by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/238
  • Feature/receipt processing settings by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/239
  • create default prompt by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/241
  • Enhancement/settings connectivity check by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/242
  • Feature/implement system settings UI by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/243
  • Task/refactor quick scan magic fill by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/244
  • Tech/refactor email integration by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/249
  • Tech/refactor email integration by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/250
  • Tech/allow admins to edit all group settings by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/251
  • enhancement/add-debug-ocr-to-system-settings by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/252
  • Feature/import config by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/253
  • Feature/add ollama support by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/254
  • Enhancement/show related system tasks by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/257
  • only set defaults if they have not been set yet by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/258
  • Enhancement/format system tasks pt2 by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/260
  • Tech/env var by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/262
  • Tech/move num workers to system settings by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/263
  • Enhancements/small fixes by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/264
  • V5 by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/265

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v4.3.0...v5.0.0
